Recently I had the opportunity to visit the Valve Software HQ based in Bellevue, WA. I was unable to take any pictures within the office itself, but instead got to take pictures of the main lobby and surrounding areas. Gabe was not around at the time of the tour and there was no mention or signs of HL3 (believe me, I asked).

The office part of Valve was really unique. Every employee (including Gaben) has a desk with wheels on the bottom, so they are allowed to simply roll their desk from meeting to meeting without giving up their beloved work stations. Valve does not have any management or "executives" in the company, so each employee must be extremely self sufficient.

At the end of the tour each person was given some valve swag which consisted of an HL2 sticker, companion cube patch, and a Dota 2 International lanyard. If anyone wishes to tour the email address for the front desk is: [email protected] and the address is: 10900 NE 4th Street, Floor 5, Bellevue, WA 98004.

Cheers!

Really cool staff there, were quick and eager to show off the offices and got to playtest L4D with the dev team which was an awesome experience (although they didn't take my advice for weapons animations).
